title: Hands, knees and bumps-a-daisy
creator_credit: National Coal Board and TV Cartoons
brief_description: A short and amusing animated industrial safety film in which Stanley Unwin exhorts his audience to safeguard themselves against injury in their work by wearing the protective gloves and knee-pads provided. Also considers the hazards of working in mines.
